body_html:
You could try adding linkshared=1 to the framework rule in tensorflow/contrib/lite/BUILD
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/BUILD#L64
(see bazel docs here https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/be/c-cpp.html)

body:
You could try adding linkshared=1 to the framework rule in tensorflow/contrib/lite/BUILD
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/BUILD#L64
(see bazel docs here https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/be/c-cpp.html)
